content: --------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew including this duty | | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew including this duty | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew including this duty | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the duty in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the duty in UTC | | trainingStartDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the duty in UTC, excluding Extended FDP(E_FDP) activity.| | trainingEndDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the duty in UTC, excluding Extended FDP(E_FDP) activity.| | trainingPosition | `'string '` | Position of the crew in training activities. Trainer or Trainee. | | numberOfActivities | `'number'` | Number of activities included in this duty of the crew | | numberOfLandings | `'number'` | Number of landings included in this duty of the crew | | totalDutyTime | `'number'` | Total duty time in minutes | | totalBlockTime | `'number'` | Total block time in minutes | | dutyTimeLimit | `'duration'` | Indicates the maximum allowable flight duty duration for the crew, expressed in hh:mm format.| | illegalityDateLimit | `'datetime'` | Represents the maximum allowable date and time for duty performance. Operating beyond this limit is not legally permitted.| | status | `'string'` | Status of the activity. The status is "ACTIVE" for duties assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed duties. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Activity Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew including this activity | | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew including this activity | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew including this activity | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | code | `'string'` | Activity code | | sta
